title: Queen of the Scalpel - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Doctors   Doting Parents   Female Protagonist   Medical Knowledge   Nobles   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Second Chance   Secret Identity   Villainess Noble Girls   Wars
author: Yuin   유인
description: She was a terrible Queen in her first life and was executed along with her family. In her second life she was a orphan but became a genius surgeon to atone for her past sin as Queen. However she died in a plane crash without fulfilling her wish. When she opened her eyes she had travel back in time when she was a noble.This time she will give it her all to avoid the prince and help people. She won’t be Queen or cause her family any trouble by being a surgeon. However the king is determined to make her his daughter in law.>
